comments: Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Ripponden.

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Hipperholme with Brighouse 
    in Brighouse Municipal Borough. See also Table 2, notes (e) and (f).

Abolished 1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Brighouse, 
    Cleckheaton and Liversedge. See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Elland with Greetland 
    in Elland Urban District. See also Table 2, note (e).
Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Elland, Greetland and Upper Greetland.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Huddesfield, 
    Elland and Brighouse. See also Table 2, note (f).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Elland with Greetland 
    in Greetland Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish 
    of Elland.
Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the Calderdale unparished area.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Liversedge 
    and Brighouse. See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Hipperholme with Brighouse 
    in Hipperholme Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish 
    of Brighouse. See also Table 2, note (c).
Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Brighouse, Hipperholme and Norwood Green & Coley.
Created 1894 from the parts of the parishes of Warley, Sowerby and Midgley, in Luddenden Foot Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Sowerby Bridge.
See Table 2, notes (b) and (e).
Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Sowerby Bridge.
Abolished 9.11.1900 and added to the parish of Halifax.

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Hipperholme 
    with Brighouse. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Brighouse.

Created 1894 from the parts of the parishes of Northowram and 
    Clayton in Queensbury Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the 
    parish of Queensbury & Shelf. See also Table 2, note (a).

Created 1.4.1937 from the parishes of Queesnbury and Shelf. See 
    also Table 2, note (e).
Abolished 1.4.1915 and added to the parish of Brighouse.
Created 1.4.1937 from the parishes of Soyland, Barkisland, Rishworth and Sowerby. See also Table 2, note (e).
Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Ripponden.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Queensbury 
    & Shelf.

Abolished 9.11.1899 and divided between the parishes of Halifax 
    and Sowerby Bridge.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Brighouse 
    and Elland.

Created 1.4.1926 by renaming the parish of Sowerby. Abolished 
    1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Sowerby Bridge and Ripponden. See 
    also Table 2, note (b).

Created 1894 from the parts of the parishes of Warley, Skircoat, 
    Sowerby and Norland, in Sowerby Bridge Urban District. Renamed 1.4.1926 to 
    become the parish of Sowerby.
Created 1.4.1937 out of the parishes of Sowerby, Luddenden Foot and Norland. See also Table 2, note (e).
Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Ripponden.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Elland and 
    Huddersfield. See also Table 2, notes (d) and (f).

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Elland with 
    Greetland. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Elland.
Abolished 9.11.1900 and added to the parish of Halifax.

That part which until 1.4.1937 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Clifton and Hartshead. See also Table 2, note (e).

That part which until 1.4.1937 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Brighouse, Fixby and Stainland with Old Lindley. See also Table 2, note 
    (f).

That part which until 1.4.1937 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Clifton and Hartshead. See also Table 2, note (e).
